description:
Offers an array of therapy services for children, adolescents and adults. Services include: 

* Individual therapy
* Family therapy
* Group therapy
* Applied behavioral analysis
* Physical therapy
* Occupational therapy
* Speech therapy
* Sensory integration therapy
* Play therapy
* Day treatment programs for children with autism and related disorder as well as mental health disorders.

Also offers psychiatric evaluations, medication management, and follow-up services.
name: MGM BEHAVIORAL
